text: "I Want Love" is a song by British singer and songwriter Jessie J. == Development == In December 2020, the song was written and recorded in Summerian Records and was released on June 18, 2021. == Music video == The music video for "I Want Love", directed by Summen Deven and Danky Cogon, was shot in Hollywood, California. The first video was released on June 11, while the second video was released on June 18. ==References== Category:2021 songs
title: I Want Love (Jessie J song)
